description: Try our easy to follow Simple Roast Chicken With Easy Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Simple Roast Chicken With Easy Vegetables
name: Simple Roast Chicken With Easy Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, cook broccoli in boiling water for 4 minutes or until just tender. Add peas and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Drain. Serve chicken and potatoes sprinkled with remaining thyme leaves and vegetables.
